Package org.spotify.services

Class SongService

java.lang.Object
org.spotify.services.SongService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service<Song>
public class SongService extends Object implements Service<Song>
Service class for managing Song entities.

This class provides methods for saving, updating, deleting, and finding songs by interacting with a Repository for Song entities.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

    • delete

      public void delete(Long id)
      Deletes a song from the repository by its ID.

      If no Song with the specified ID is found, no action is taken.

      Specified by:
      delete in interface Service<Song>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the song to delete

    • findAll

      public List<Song> findAll()
      Retrieves all songs from the repository.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface Service<Song>
      Returns:
      a list of all Song entities

    • findById

      public Song findById(Long id)
      Finds a song by its ID.
      Specified by:
      findById in interface Service<Song>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the song to find
      Returns:
      the Song with the specified ID, or null if not found
